title: Ithaca Gameday
text:
Ithaca Gameday The Ithaca Journal 4:07 p.m. EDT October 23, 2015 Ithaca College's football team will look to get back on track Saturday when it heads to Morrisville State to face the Mustangs in a 1 p.m. start at Drake Field. Ithaca junior quarterback Wolfgang Shafer has completed 116 of 182 passes for 1,307 yards and 11 touchdowns this season. He and the Bombers take on Morrisville State at 1 p.m. Saturday in Morrisville. (Photo: TOM FLEISCHMAN / Staff Photo) 
Who: Ithaca Bombers (4-2, 2-2) at Morrisville State Mustangs (3-3, 2-3). 
When: 1 p.m. 
Radio: WICB (91.7). 
Internet: athletics.ithaca.edu/ 
Series: Saturday's game is the first football meeting between the schools. Morrisville was in the New Jersey Athletic Conference from 2006-14. 
Coaches: For Ithaca, Mike Welch, Ithaca ’73 (22nd season, 164-69). For Morrisville State, Curt Fitzpatrick, Ohio University '12 (third season, 15-12). 
Leaders: For Ithaca, so. RB Tristan Brown (94-451, 4 TDs); jr. QB Wolfgang Shafer (116-for-182, 1,307 yards, 11 TDs, 9 INTs); sr. WR Josh Oliver (33-394, 4 TDs); sr. TE Kyle Hastings (24-345, 5 TDs); so. LB Dan Loizos (50 tackles, 8 tackles for loss). For Morrisville, jr. QB Cory Benedetto (82-for-176, 1,409 yards, 11 TDs, 4 INTs); sr. RB Cristian Pena (115-590, 7 TDs); so. WR Marcus Jackson (26-377, 2 TDs); sr. WR Anthony Mella (21-567, 4 TDs); sr. DL Julian Serrano (49 tackles, 10.5 TFL). 
Quick facts: Morrisville is coming off a 31-28 victory over Hartwick, the Mustangs winning despite Hawks quarterback John Garcia's 404-yard passing day. Cristian Pena rushed for 115 yards in the win. ... Morrisville finished 9-2 last season and finished tied with Montclair and Rowan for the NJAC title. The Mustangs beat Utica, 52-41, in the ECAC North Central Bowl Championship game. ... Ithaca ranks first in Division III in red-zone scoring, coming away with points in 22 of 23 trips inside the opponent's 20-yard line. 
Next game: Ithaca returns home next Saturday to face Empire 8 foe St. John Fisher, beginning at 1 p.m. at Butterfield Stadium. It will be Senior Day on South Hill. 
Schedule/results 
Sept 5 at Union; W, 38-23 
Sept. 19, Hobart: W, 24-6 
Sept. 26, Alfred-x: W, 38-18 
Oct. 3 at Utica-x: L, 27-30 (OT) 
Oct. 10 at Hartwick-x: W, 47-19 
Oct. 17, Brockport-x, L, 17-27 
Oct. 24 at Morrisville-x, 1 p.m. 
Oct. 31, St. John Fisher-x, 1 p.m. 
Nov. 7, at Buffalo State-x, Noon 
Nov. 14, SUNY Cortland-x, Noon 
x-Empire 8 game 
Also at Ithaca: 
The Bomber field hockey team hosts Utica at 11 a.m. Saturday at Higgins Stadium, the 23-3 volleyball team plays host to Hartwick (11 a.m.) and St. John Fisher (4 p.m.) Saturday in Light Gym, the men's soccer team hosts Nazareth at noon Saturday at Wood Field, and the swim teams host Brockport at 1 p.m. Saturday in the Aquatics Pavilion. 
— Tom Fleischman Read or Share this story: http://ithacajr.nl/1S1bHQP TOP VIDEOS
